post.body: Btw, messgae me or something so that I don't have to start my Latin project
I don't wanna go school tomorrow, maybe we'll get lucky and have another snow day...
Boo...everyone's going to see the cure and I'm stuck here doing a Latin project.
Is cramming for Latin with Monica.
I'm going to the mall to plan a SWEET party.
Is still super pissed that Prop 8 passed. Otherwise, I'm going to sleep over a friends house. Hopefully going to Battle of the Bands tom.
Sorry. Typed that wrong. It's www.thisismylifehuh.blogspot.com
New blog: www.blogspot.com/thisismylifehuh My eyelid has been twitching for the last half hour....
Uploading "Guild Wars" cuz I'm a nerd....
Can't sleep. I have too much on my mind plaaning for the party...
She just yelled at me btw...
I burned my thumb on the hot glue gun. It was tingling but now I can't feel it. Should I be worried?
